title: Girl hit by car in driveway of family home
text:
A toddler has been seriously injured by a car outside the family home on Saturday.

The two-year-old girl from Parawa was run over at around 1.45pm at the Range Rd property on the lower Fleurieu Peninsula.

Police and paramedics rushed to the scene after a four-wheel-drive was reported to have struck a child.

The toddler was flown to the Women’s and Children’s Hospital where she remains in a life-threatening condition.

The driver, a 55-year-old family member, was not injured in the crash.

Major crash were at the scene on Saturday investigating the circumstances that led to the crash. MORE TO COME
description: A toddler is in the Womens and Childrens Hospital in a serious condition, after being hit by a car outside the family home.
